page.title: 01DARTINGTON AND TOTNES
page.content: This area is set in the beautiful Dart valley,in the rolling scenery of South Devon.It contains a unique range of historical buildings and facilities forming a popular tourist area and a desirable,expensive place to live.The main attractions include Dartington Hall,Totnes Castle and the Elizabethan main street of Totnes. The area also contains a wide range of educational facilities and small businesses,many of which are based in the Arts and Crafts tradition. The population of Totnes was about 6000 in 1979,and has expanded considerably since then.The population of Dartington is about 2000,dispersed in the seperate hamlets of Cott,Week, Puddaven,Dartington Hall,Huxhams Cross ,Barracks Hill and Allerton.
